pr_title: docs: Remove Java7 from supported languages and add upgrade guide

timeline.message: docs: Remove Java7 from supported languages and add upgrade guide

timeline.bodyText: Need Range with example of how to migrate.
timeline.author: childish-sambino
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,34 @@
 # Upgrade Guide
 
-_After `7.4.0` all `MINOR` and `MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes 
-posted here._
+_`MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes posted here._
+
+[2020-10-01] 7.x.x to 8.x.x
+-----------------------------
+
+### Overview
+
+Version `8.x.x` is the first version that officially drops support for Java 7. 
+
+- Removal of dependencies offering functionality included in Java 8 and beyond:
+    - Guava, for example:
+        - `com.google.common.base.Joiner` -> `String.join()`
+        - `com.google.common.collect.Lists` -> `Array.asList()`
+        - `com.google.common.base.Function` -> `java.util.function.Function`

replies.bodyText: I'm working on this one (Range) in this sprint with DI-850.
replies.author: thinkingserious

timeline.bodyText: PR link to be added when available
timeline.author: eshanholtz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,41 @@
 # Upgrade Guide
 
-_After `7.4.0` all `MINOR` and `MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes 
-posted here._
+_`MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes posted here._
+
+[2020-09-28] 7.x.x to 8.x.x
+-----------------------------
+
+### Overview
+
+Version `8.x.x` is the first version that officially drops support for Java 7. 
+
+- Removal of dependencies offering functionality included in Java 8 and beyond:
+    - [Guava functional interfaces](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/574), for example:
+        - `com.google.common.base.Joiner` -> `String.join()`
+        - `com.google.common.collect.Lists` -> `Array.asList()`
+        - `com.google.common.base.Function` -> `java.util.function.Function`
+        - [`com.google.common.base.MoreObjects` -> `lombok.ToString`](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/576)
+    - [Guava concurrency, hashing, and charstreams](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/575)
+        - `com.google.common.hash.Hash*` -> `org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils`
+        - `com.google.common.io.CharStreams` -> `org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils`
+        - `com.google.common.util.concurrent.*` -> `java.util.concurrent`
+    - [Guava `com.google.common.collect.Range` removal]()

timeline.bodyText: Only changes that affect client usage should be listed here. For instance, it doesn't matter to the client that we're using String.join() under the hood instead of a Guava joiner. It's an implementation detail. Things that do matter to consumers is the date stuff, removal of Range support, removal of deprecated stuff, and maybe some of the concurrency interfaces.
timeline.author: childish-sambino
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,41 @@
 # Upgrade Guide
 
-_After `7.4.0` all `MINOR` and `MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes 
-posted here._
+_`MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes posted here._
+
+[2020-09-28] 7.x.x to 8.x.x
+-----------------------------
+
+### Overview
+
+Version `8.x.x` is the first version that officially drops support for Java 7. 
+
+- Removal of dependencies offering functionality included in Java 8 and beyond:
+    - [Guava functional interfaces](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/574), for example:
+        - `com.google.common.base.Joiner` -> `String.join()`
+        - `com.google.common.collect.Lists` -> `Array.asList()`

timeline.bodyText: These need more details. Yes, the types changed, but what does that mean to consumers? I.e., how do I update my code to use the new types?
timeline.author: childish-sambino
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,36 @@
 # Upgrade Guide
 
-_After `7.4.0` all `MINOR` and `MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes 
-posted here._
+_`MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes posted here._
+
+[2020-09-28] 7.x.x to 8.x.x
+-----------------------------
+
+### Overview
+
+Version `8.x.x` is the first version that officially drops support for Java 7. 
+
+- Removal of dependencies offering functionality included in Java 8 and beyond:
+    - [Guava concurrency, hashing, and charstreams](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/575)
+        - `com.google.common.hash.Hash*` -> `org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils`
+        - `com.google.common.io.CharStreams` -> `org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils`
+        - `com.google.common.util.concurrent.*` -> `java.util.concurrent`
+    - [Guava `com.google.common.collect.Range` removal]()
+        - Example: `setMessageDate(final Range<LocalDate> rangeMessageDate)` -> `setMessageDate(final LocalDate messageDateBefore, final LocalDate messageDateAfter)`
+    - [joda-time](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/572)
+        - `org.joda.time.DateTime` -> `java.time.ZonedDateTime`
+        - `org.joda.time.LocalDate` -> `java.time.LocalDate`

timeline.bodyText: What are the old methods/classes that I need to migrate off and what are the new methods/classes that I need to migrate to?
timeline.author: childish-sambino
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,36 @@
 # Upgrade Guide
 
-_After `7.4.0` all `MINOR` and `MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes 
-posted here._
+_`MAJOR` version bumps will have upgrade notes posted here._
+
+[2020-09-28] 7.x.x to 8.x.x
+-----------------------------
+
+### Overview
+
+Version `8.x.x` is the first version that officially drops support for Java 7. 
+
+- Removal of dependencies offering functionality included in Java 8 and beyond:
+    - [Guava concurrency, hashing, and charstreams](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/575)
+        - `com.google.common.hash.Hash*` -> `org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils`
+        - `com.google.common.io.CharStreams` -> `org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils`
+        - `com.google.common.util.concurrent.*` -> `java.util.concurrent`
+    - [Guava `com.google.common.collect.Range` removal]()
+        - Example: `setMessageDate(final Range<LocalDate> rangeMessageDate)` -> `setMessageDate(final LocalDate messageDateBefore, final LocalDate messageDateAfter)`
+    - [joda-time](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/572)
+        - `org.joda.time.DateTime` -> `java.time.ZonedDateTime`
+        - `org.joda.time.LocalDate` -> `java.time.LocalDate`
+- [Removal of deprecated classes and methods](https://github.com/twilio/twilio-java/pull/578):
+    - `com.twilio.jwt.accesstoken.ConversationsGrant`
+    - `com.twilio.jwt.accesstoken.IpMessagingGrant`
+    - `com.twilio.jwt.accesstoken.VideoGrant.getConfigurationProfileSid()`
+    - `com.twilio.jwt.accesstoken.VideoGrant.setConfigurationProfileSid()`
+    - Renamed child TwiML methods:
+        - `com.twilio.twiml.voice.Refer.Builder.referSip`
+        - `com.twilio.twiml.voice.Say.Builder.ssml<Element>`

replies.bodyText: Even though all those old methods/classes have been marked as deprecated with a documented workaround for over a year?
replies.author: eshanholtz

replies.bodyText: The docs regarding the workaround are being removed, so adding here or a link will help.
replies.author: childish-sambino

timeline.bodyText: A range could be bound by upper, lower, or both. Think this should be broken out to 2 methods similar to what's done in other languages: setMessageDateBefore and setMessageDateAfter. Also need an example of how to change my code. What should my code look like before and after?
timeline.author: childish-sambino
